title: Minimalist Grey Solid Midi Dress
image_prompt: flat-lay product render of a minimalist solid grey midi dress, A-line silhouette, short sleeves, crew neckline, soft matte cotton fabric, isolated on plain white background, high-detail fabric texture, visible stitching and clean hems, no model, no mannequin
techpack: A-line midi dress in solid grey cotton poplin with short sleeves and crew neckline. Hidden side zipper closure, topstitching for durability, clean hem finish. Regular fit with minimal detailing for a modern, versatile look.
provenance: Designed based on combination of grey color palette and minimalist solid print trend.
design_text:
Minimalist Grey Solid Midi Dress (GREY_SOLID_MINIMALIST_001)
Colors: charcoal grey, ash grey, light silver
Fabrics: cotton poplin, organic cotton
Prints/Patterns: solid
Garment Type: dress
Silhouette: A-line
Sleeves: short sleeves
Neckline: crew neckline
Length: midi
Style / Fit: r, e, g, u, l, a, r,  , f, i, t
Trims & details: topstitching along seams, hidden side zipper, clean hem finish
Techpack: available
